plot: Granny is snail-pacing to her favorite spot when she gets overtaken by Mrs Messala. Both old ladies maneuver their zimmerframes in a breathtaking, funny but violent race.
title: Run Granny Run!
plot_es: Granny is snail-pacing to her favorite spot when she gets overtaken by Mrs Messala. Both old ladies maneuver their zimmerframes in a breathtaking, funny but violent race.
plot_en: Granny is snail-pacing to her favorite spot when she gets overtaken by Mrs Messala. Both old ladies maneuver their zimmerframes in a breathtaking, funny but violent race.
